Name: Zombo Buster Rising
About the game: Shoot zombies from terrace like a boss! Zombo Buster Rising Remastered brings you a nostalgic experience of classic 2D side shooting-defense in enhanced build right from your Steam library! FEATURES: - Challenging Steam Achievements - Steam Trading Card - Steam Cloud - Two AI-Assisted NPCs - Three super abilities - Various upgrades - Survival Mode - Support Windows, Mac and Linux
